Gaurav Chaudhry.message: From the early days playing cricket on your driveway, to driving me to school (always late of course), and being a role model for me and our whole community, you've shaped so much of who I am today. We sincerely hope you can join us to celebrate our special day!

Saurab Chaudhry.message: My brother! My life would not have been the same without you in it, and I wouldn't be who I am today without having had the chance to grow up alongside you. We sincerely hope you can join us to celebrate our special day!

Sukhjot Singh.message: I'm so glad that we've been able to stay in touch, and arguably get even closer this past year! This invitation is huge creds to you, and it's been so amazing to watch your talent explode since we grew up together. We sincerely hope you can join us to celebrate our special day!

Sholak Vyas.message: From the early debauchery days in your basement for the holidays to now, my life wouldn't be the same with you in it my man. Even though we barely got to hang out in NYC, I'm so glad we've had the chance to stay close over the years. We sincerely hope you can join us to celebrate our special day!

Andrew Lubera.message: I consider myself so lucky to have grown alongside you the past 13 years, and am glad to this day that you were one of my first friends that Shriya ever met. I'm honored that we've been able to stay so close over the years. We sincerely hope you can join us to celebrate our special day, and we can't wait to celebrate yours!

Clay Davis.message: Words can't describe how thankful, and grateful Shriya and I are to have you in our lives. Anjan Kashyab.message: From the early tennis days to today, it's been amazing to watch you continue to excel at everything you do. We are so grateful to have you (and now Smriti) in our lives, and we sincerely hope you can join us to celebrate our special day!

Umesh Jairath.message: None of this would be possible without you. There are not enough words on this card to do you justice. Everything I am today, I owe to you. We love you both.

Munish Bhatla.message: As family, the space on this tiny virtual card could never do you all justice. Even though we never get to spend as much time as we wish, we are so grateful to be a part of this family. We can't wait to see you all in Barcelona!

We sincerely hope you can join us to celebrate our special day!

Nitin Goel.message: I don't think there are enough words on this virtual card, even at a font size of 1, to describe how much you and Ruple mean to us. We wouldn't do it justice. So here's us filling space to make the card look full. We love you both.

Rajni Jayswal.message: Mom, Dad, and Neil, feel so lucky to be your daughter and sister. Dad I love your happy personality and your ability to make jokes in any scenario. Mom, you are the most caring person I know and so glad I got that personality trait from you. Growing up you guys have never said no to any of my wishes and I am truly blessed. Neil, you have always been a protective big brother and always looked after me. I feel so blessed to have you guys by my side for our wedding day! We love you!

Kanu Jayswal.message: Dear Kaki and Kaka, my other two parents haha. Growing up I always had a blast playing with Harina and Needhi. You two never let me feel like a stranger in your home. Always treated me as your own daughter. Can't wait to celebrate in Barcelona!

Harina Hirpara.message: I feel myself lucky to have grown by your side for 30 years!! You, Needhi and I have gone through some major milestones together! From moving together in a small town called McLean, Seeing you become a mom, and now finally getting myself married!! Can't wait to celebrate together in Barcelona!

Needhi Jayswal.message: I feel myself lucky to have grown by your side for 30 years!! You, Harina and I have gone through some major milestones together! From playing together in the Bensenville playgrounds, to college years and now to getting each other married. Can't wait to celebrate together in Barcelona!

Pratima Jayswal.message: Man Pratima you have known me since the day I was born haha. Always remember you saying how you used to change my diapers growing up and always play with me after school. Love hanging out with you and you are always making me laugh! Can't wait to celebrate together in Barcelona!

Nidhi Parikh.message: I feel so lucky to have known you for I think 16 years now haha. You know what they say about friendships that have lasted more than 10 years last a lifetime glad we were able to make this far! I miss our fun adventures growing up from going to homecoming together, and spending every summer off! Can't wait for more adventures together and so happy to celebrate together in Barcelona!

Priya Patel.message: Priya, so glad we became friends freshman year of college! We have made so many memories together from DPO days to girls trip! I can't wait to celebrate together in Barcelona!

Nisha Sharma.message: Nisha, glad you approached me in nursing school to become friends. I miss being roommates with you and miss studying together in Lincoln Hall. Jay is such a fun time as well! Love his jokes and Neil and I love that he is such a foodie! I truly appreciate our friendship and can't wait to celebrate in Barcelona!

Jodi Isaac.message: Jodi I am glad we decided to become roommates Sophomore year together! We have created a lot of fun memories to DPO and our girls trip! Can't wait to celebrate together in Barcelona!

Swetha Maddipuddi.message: Swetha, so glad we met each other in NYC! Love all the fun adventures we had from night out in Brooklyn, chai and paint nights and our pilates class! Neil and I are so happy that we met you in NYC and can't wait to celebrate in Barcelona!

Vritti Samtani.message: Vritti, so glad we met each other at UIC! You are always a great time to hang out and always down for new adventures! I miss our girls and miss hearing your infectious giggly laugh! Neil and I can't wait to celebrate together in Barcelona!

Denya Albasseri.message: Denya, so glad we met each other at UIC! I miss our chem labs together and miss studying with you! I will forever cherish you surprising me in NYC! I can't wait to celebrate together in Barcelona!

Niamh Rock.message: Niamh I am so glad we met each other in SF! Neil and I love the cookie adventures you took us in NYC. We always love that you always down for new adventures and we can't wait to celebrate together in Barcelona!

Partha Ryali.message: Man, we are so grateful that you've been a part of our lives since the very first day we crashed at your and Needhi's apartment, and we've continued to get even closer ever since. We couldn't imagine our life without you in it. Can't wait to celebrate with you soon!

Jay Sharma.message: We are so happy you entered our lives on that first date with Nisha a few years ago, and we are grateful that we've been able to stay in touch over the years! We couldn't imagine our lives without you guys in it. Can't wait to celebrate with you soon!
